name: proofpoint-threat-response
label: Proofpoint Threat Response
description: Proofpoint Threat Response is a solution designed to help organizations manage and respond to cybersecurity threats. It provides tools and features to identify, investigate, and remediate security incidents.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Proofpoint Threat Response server to connect and perform automated operations.

operations.title: Ingest Alert
operations.description: Ingest an alert into Threat Response.

parameters.name: json_version
parameters.title: JSON Version
parameters.description:
Specify the Threat Response JSON version.
Possible values are: 2.0, 1.0. Default is 2.0.
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the Threat Response JSON version.
Possible values are: 2.0, 1.0. Default is 2.0.

parameters.name: post_url_id
parameters.title: Post URL ID
parameters.description: Specify the POST URL of the JSON alert source. You can find it by navigating to Sources -> JSON event source -> POST URL.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the POST URL of the JSON alert source. You can find it by navigating to Sources -> JSON event source -> POST URL.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.title: Attacker
parameters.description: Specify an attacker object in JSON format : "{"attacker" : {...}}". The attacker object must contain one of ["ip_address", mac_address", "host_name", "url", "user"] keys. You can also add the "port" key to the object. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify an attacker object in JSON format : "{"attacker" : {...}}". The attacker object must contain one of ["ip_address", mac_address", "host_name", "url", "user"] keys. You can also add the "port" key to the object. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: classification
parameters.title: Classification
parameters.description: Specify the alert classification shown as "Alert Type" in the TRAP UI.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert classification shown as "Alert Type" in the TRAP UI.

parameters.name: cnc_hosts
parameters.title: CNC Hosts
parameters.description:
Specify the Command and Control host information in JSON format : "{"cnc_hosts": [{"host" : "-", "port": "-"}, ...]}".
Note: Every item of the "cnc_hosts" list is in JSON format. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the Command and Control host information in JSON format : "{"cnc_hosts": [{"host" : "-", "port": "-"}, ...]}".
Note: Every item of the "cnc_hosts" list is in JSON format. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: detector
parameters.title: Detector
parameters.description: Specify the threat detection tool such as Firewall and IPS/IDS systems (in the format: "{"detector" : {...}}"), which generated the original alert. To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify the threat detection tool such as Firewall and IPS/IDS systems (in the format: "{"detector" : {...}}"), which generated the original alert. To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: email
parameters.title: Email
parameters.description: Specify the email metadata related to the alert, in JSON format: "{"email": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email metadata related to the alert, in JSON format: "{"email": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: forensics_hosts
parameters.title: Forensics Hosts
parameters.description:
Specify the forensics host information in JSON format : "{"forensics_hosts": [{"host" : "-", "port": "-"}...]}".
Note: Every item of the "forensics_hosts" list is in JSON format. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the forensics host information in JSON format : "{"forensics_hosts": [{"host" : "-", "port": "-"}...]}".
Note: Every item of the "forensics_hosts" list is in JSON format. For more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: link_attribute
parameters.title: Link Attribute
parameters.description: Specify the attribute to link to the alerts.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the attribute to link to the alerts.

parameters.name: severity
parameters.title: Severity
parameters.description: Specify the severity of the alert.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the severity of the alert.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.title: Summary
parameters.description: Specify the alert summary. This argument will populate the Alert Details field.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert summary. This argument will populate the Alert Details field.

parameters.name: target
parameters.title: Target
parameters.description: Specify the target host information in JSON format : "{"target": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify the target host information in JSON format : "{"target": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: threat_info
parameters.title: Threat Info
parameters.description: Specify the threat information in JSON format: "{"threat_info": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify the threat information in JSON format: "{"threat_info": {...}}". To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".

parameters.name: custom_fields
parameters.title: Custom Fields
parameters.description: Specify a JSON object for collecting custom name-value pairs as part of the JSON alert sent to Threat Response, in the format: "{"custom_fields": {..}}". Although there is no limit to the number of custom fields, Proofpoint recommends keeping it to 10 or fewer fields. To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
parameters.tooltip: Specify a JSON object for collecting custom name-value pairs as part of the JSON alert sent to Threat Response, in the format: "{"custom_fields": {..}}". Although there is no limit to the number of custom fields, Proofpoint recommends keeping it to 10 or fewer fields. To see all relevant JSON fields and for more information, see Proofpoint TRAP documentation under "JSON Alert Source 2.0".
